Web Application¶

class showtable.dataRow(row)¶

A class to store a row in the table in the database.

class showtable.dataTable(items, classes=None, thead_classes=None, sort_by=None, sort_reverse=False, no_items=None, table_id=None, border=None, html_attrs=None)¶

A class to store the entries in a row of a database table.

The table in the database would store the predicted values of the character drawn by the user. This class stores the entries in one row of that table. This class inherits from the Table class in flask_table module.

id¶

Col – Unique ID column in the table.

character¶

Col – Column storing the predicted user drawn character.

showtable.getHtmlTable(queryResult)¶

Generate the HTML code to display a table.

Parameters:queryResult (ResultProxy) – A ResultProxy representing results of an SQL statement execution.
Returns:The HTML code for the given table.
Return type:str
helper.compress_image(pixel_list, size, base)¶

Convert a list of pixels into a size x size image and compress it into a base x base image.

Parameters:
  • pixel_list (str) – A comma separated string containing pixel values.
  • size (int) – Height and width of the image corresponding to the pixel list.
  • base (int) – Height and width of the compressed image.
Returns:

A base x base 2d numpy array corresponding to the compressed image.
Return type:

numpy.ndarray
helper.predict_character(model_path, image)¶

Predict the character drawn in a 28x28 grayscale image.

Parameters:
  • model_path (str) – Path to the model file used to load the keras model.
  • image (numpy.ndarray) – A 28 x 28 numpy array with the grayscale pixel values of the image.
Returns:

The predicted character or the string “Failed to recognize!” if no match found.
Return type:

str
helper.read_metadata(metadata_file_path)¶

Read the YAML file containing metadata

Parameters:metadata_file_path (str) – The path of the file containing the training data.
Returns:File object of the YAML metadata file.
Return type:File Object
helper.store_prediction(prediction)¶

Store the predicted character in the database.

Parameters:prediction (str) – The predicted character to be stored in the database.
